definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

History of Three Kingdoms (Korean: Samguk Sagi), the oldest extant Korean history, compiled under Kim Busik 金富軾|金富轼[Jin1 Fu4 shi4] in 1145. The three kingdoms are Goguryeo 高句麗|高句丽[Gao1 gou1 li2], Baekje 百濟|百济[Bai3 ji4], Silla 新羅|新罗[Xin1 luo2].

sentences.english: It is the striking theme of the ruling history and country history that people are the masters.
sentences.chinese: 人民当家作主成为党的执政史和国史的鲜明主题。

sentences.english: This series of lectures forms part of a complete course on French history.
sentences.chinese: 这一系列的演讲为一门法国史课程的一部分。

sentences.english: Hoskins once called him), but otherwise to teenagers it all seems relatively dull.
sentences.chinese: 而此外的英国史对青少年而言似乎相对乏趣可陈。

sentences.english: As a result of orthodoxy, then all the history of the old China of an extremely brief period of writing.
sentences.chinese: 由于正统观念作怪，旧中国史将这一段写的极其简略。

sentences.english: After the Yuan Dynasty, only without the national history of the Record.
sentences.chinese: 元代以后，则只有实录而无国史了。

sentences.english: Zheng Qiao is a worthwhile and advertent person in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 郑樵是中国史上很值得注意的人。

sentences.english: You mean it can tell me 500 years of Chinese history?
sentences.chinese: 你是说故宫能向我讲述500年的中国史吗？

sentences.english: She's still giving the toughest English history exams in the school and loving every minute of it.
sentences.chinese: 她还是在学校里出最难的英国史考试题，且乐此不疲。

sentences.english: The intonation of poems and quoting poems in the Spring and Autumn period were a special culture phenomenon of Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 春秋“赋诗引诗”，是中国史上一种特殊的文化现象。

sentences.english: Premier Yu presents a military sword to President Stroessner of Paraguay .
sentences.chinese: 俞院长赠送军刀给巴国史托斯纳尔总统。

sentences.english: The 1st Female Emperor in Chinese History.
sentences.chinese: 中国史上唯一的女皇帝。

sentences.english: His father is an expert on Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是中国史方面的专家。

definition: History of the Five Dynasties, eighteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Xue Juzheng 薛居正[Xue1 Ju1 zheng4] in 974 during Northern Song 北宋[Bei3 Song4], 150 scrolls

A Mirror for the Wise Ruler (or Comprehensive Mirror for Aid in Government), a vast chronological general history, written by 司馬光|司马光[Si1 ma3 Guang1] Sima Guang (1019-1089) and collaborators during the Northern Song in 1084, covering the period 403 BC-959 AD, 294 scrolls

History of the Song Dynasty, twentieth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 496 scrolls/(not to be confused with 宋書|宋书[Song4 shu1])
Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
History of the Ming Dynasty, twenty fourth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhang Tingyu 張廷玉|张廷玉[Zhang1 Ting2 yu4] in 1739 during the Qing Dynasty, 332 scrolls
official in charge of public records
history genre based on biography, such as Sima Qian's Record of the Historian
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
